info.description: SoundCloud API. Search for artists, tracks, albums, and playlists. Get detailed info on your favorites and grab stream URLs for listening or downloading.
info.name: Soundcloud API

item.description: Find albums by a query, use `/v2/album/get` endpoint for a single album, using the IDs from this endpoint
item.name: Search albums

query.description:
**Required if token is not set**

The query to find results from.

**Optional**

Pagination token from previous response as the `meta.nextToken` to get the next batch of results.

item.description: Get an album by ID, use the `/v2/album/search` endpoint to search for albums and IDs.

query.description:
**Required**

ID of the item, to get allowed values, use the `search` endpoint.

**Allowed format**

item.description: Find tracks by a query, use `/v2/track/get` endpoint for a single track, using the IDs from this endpoint
item.name: Search tracks

**Required if token is not set**

The query to find results from.

**Optional**

Pagination token from previous response as the `meta.nextToken` to get the next batch of results.

item.description: Get a stream or a download by the `streamId` and `trackAuthorization`, to get those values use either the `/v2/track/search` or `/v2/track/get` endpoint.
item.name: Get stream or download

query.description:
**Required**

ID of the stream, use the track-endpoints to get this value.

**Required**

Authorization of the stream, use the track-endpoints to get this value.

**Required**

ID of the stream, use the track-endpoints to get this value.

**Required**

Authorization of the stream, use the track-endpoints to get this value.
